client.proxy

Class ProxyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.proxy.ProxyFacade

  • public class ProxyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves as a large wrapper class. The client will only use this proxy which will call all the other proxy classes methods

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProxyFacade(Proxy proxy)
      Constructor class Should initialize the Proxy
